Detailed Description

Class to select from multiple Datagram- or TCPsockets.

bool SocketReceiver::select (  int32  micros,
TCPSocket *&  tcpSock,
DatagramReceiver *&  datagramSock
) 
 

Select the .

Parameters:
micros Time in microseconds before timeout. If < 0 then wait forever.
tcpSock The selected TCPSocket if a TCPSocket was selected.
udpSocket The selected DatagramSocket if a datagramSocket was selected.
Returns:
True if socket has data, false if timeout.
